license.notes: EPL-2.0 / Apache-2.0 dual (Rust core is EPL-2.0). Study-only for CIF extraction. Zenoh is the preferred WAN bridge for ROS 2 DDS traffic (via zenoh-bridge-ros2dds). The Rust API types define the pub/sub/query model.

extraction.notes: Extract Zenoh API types from Rust source: KeyExpr, Sample, Publisher, Subscriber, Query, Reply, Session. Map to CIF entities for the telemetry streaming model.
